description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. Take the role of a dangerously powerful hypnotist in this dark story-driven experience.  Use your abilities to cut a bloody swath through the city by ripping the intentions from one person and branding them down on others. Wherever you go, the people around you are your weapons – use them through 17 varied missions of assassination, interrogation, and mayhem as you exact your revenge on the world.
